trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The items that were unselected during this event.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram desmarcados durante esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The items that were selected during this event.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram selecionados durante esse evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains the items that were selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista que contém os itens que foram selecionados.

trans-unit.source: The items that were selected since the last time the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram selecionados desde a última vez o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"> </xref> evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Performs the proper type casting to call the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventHandler"></xref> delegate for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Executa a conversão de tipo adequado para chamar a segurança de tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventHandler"> </xref> delegar o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The current object along the event's route.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual ao longo de rota do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains the items that were unselected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista que contém os itens que foram desmarcados.

trans-unit.source: The items that were unselected since the last time the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que foram desmarcados desde a última vez o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"> </xref> evento ocorreu.
